name: Overdrive (itch) (Dwachkarr)
description:
My first attempt to dive into gamedev. Still a prototype, just a couple of levels to play around and figure out what works and what doesn't. Feel free to leave your feedback.

Key Bindings:

Move: WASD / Arrow Keys

Open door: Press up (W) or (Arrow UP)

Jump: Space

Reset Level: R

Pause: ESC

No controller support atm.

Credits:

[Music]

AIRGLOW - System Shutdown

INTRNLCMD - Hyruler

Synth Kid - Far From Home

[SFX]

Free Casual Game Sounds - Dustyroom

Kenney • RPG Audio

[Art]

Kings and Pigs by Pixel Frog (itch.io)

Pixel Adventure by Pixel Frog (itch.io)

CATSET by seethingswarm (itch.io)

Install instructions

1. Download game.

2. Unzip folder.

3. Launch Overdrive.exe

4. Use alt + F4 to close the game, sry, didn't have enough time to implement proper UI and exit feature.
